languages.text: "Это... Клянусь Золотым Троном, это утерянная печать! Сколько же ей пришлось пережить за четверть века, прежде чем попасть в руки к... впрочем, неважно. Я позабочусь об ее реставрации, как только заверю вашу грамоту".

traits.locale_text: "Это... Клянусь золотым Троном, это утерянная печать! Сколько же ей пришлось пережить за четверть века, прежде чем попасть в руки к... впрочем, неважно. Я позабочусь об ее реставрации, как только заверю вашу грамоту".

languages.text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."
languages.original_text: "Это... Клянусь Золотым Троном, это утерянная печать! Сколько же ей пришлось пережить за четверть века, прежде чем попасть в руки к... впрочем, неважно. Я позабочусь об ее реставрации, как только заверю вашу грамоту".

traits.locale_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! The things it must have gone through before... But no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."
"It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! The things it must have gone through before... But no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."
"It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! The things it must have gone through before... But no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

"It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

"It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

languages.text: « C'est... Par le Trône d'Or, c'est le sceau disparu ! Je n'ose pas imaginer ce qui a pu lui arriver au cours du quart de siècle écoulé avant qu'il atterrisse entre les mains de... Bref, peu importe. Dès que j'aurai certifié votre document, je ferai en sorte que cet objet soit restauré. »
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: « Que... Par le Trône d'Or, c'est le sceau disparu ! Je n'ose imaginer ce qu'il a dû subir pour... bah, qu'importe. Dès que j'aurai certifié votre document, je ferai en sorte que cet objet soit restauré. »

languages.text: “这是……黄金王座在上！这就是那枚丢失的印章！这么多年，它究竟经历了什么事情？最后居然会落在——不过，没关系。等我认证了您的文件之后，我会马上安排人把它复原。”
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: “这是……黄金王座在上！这就是那枚丢失的印章！它肯定经历了很多事情……但没关系。等我认证了您的文件之后，我会马上安排人把它复原。”

languages.text: "Das ist ... beim Goldenen Thron, das ist das verlorene Siegel! Was muss ihm während eines Vierteljahrhunderts widerfahren sein, ehe es in den Händen von ... aber egal. Ich lasse es restaurieren, sobald ich Euer Dokument beglaubigt habe."
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ... beim Goldenen Thron, das ist das verlorene Siegel! Was muss es alles durchgemacht haben ... Aber das ist nun gleichgültig. Ich lasse es restaurieren, sobald ich Euer Dokument beglaubigt habe."

languages.text: «Es... Por el Trono Dorado, ¡es el sello perdido! Debe de haber pasado por todo tipo de cosas en este cuarto de siglo hasta acabar en manos de... Pero eso no importa. Ordenaré que lo restauren en cuanto certifique su documento».
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: «Es... Por el Trono Dorado, ¡es el sello perdido! Debe de haber pasado por todo tipo de cosas... Pero da igual. Ordenaré que restauren el documento después de que se lo certifique».

languages.text: 「これは…黄金の玉座の名にかけて、失われた印章でございます！他人の手に渡ってからの四半世紀の間に、紆余曲折あったのでしょう…っと、それは置いておいて。陛下の文書を認証した後、直ちに修復するよう手配します」
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: 「これは…黄金の玉座の名にかけて、失われた印章でございます！他人の手に渡ってからの四半世紀の間に、紆余曲折あったのでしょう…っと、それは置いておいて。陛下の文書を認証した後、直ちに修復するよう手配します」

languages.text: "Bu... Altın Taht aşkına, bu o kayıp mühür! Acaba yirmi beş yıldır neler oldu da döne dolaşa o cebe... Gerçi hiç önemi yok. Belgenizi tasdik eder etmez restorasyonunu ayarlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "It's... By the Golden Throne, it's the lost seal! What it must have gone through in the quarter of a century before it ended up in the hands of— but no matter. I will arrange to have it restored right after I certify your document."

traits.locale_text: "Bu... Altın Taht aşkına, bu o kayıp mühür! Acaba 25 yıldır neler oldu da döne dolaşa o cebe... Gerçi hiç önemi yok. Belgenizi tasdik eder etmez restorasyonunu ayarlayacağım."
